eventSummary: An attack exploited a zero-day vulnerability (CVE-2025-61882) in Oracle E-Business Suite, with preparatory activity detected in early July 2025 and initial intrusion in August.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5t422ifkl2x
